name: Suspicious Encoded Obfuscated LOAD String
description: Detects suspicious base64 encoded and obbfuscated LOAD string often used for reflection.assembly load
query: process.command_line:(/.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Mm][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Ii][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Yy][Qq][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Tt][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Vv][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Bb][Ww][Bb][Hh][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Mm][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Yy][Qq][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Vv][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Ii][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Bb][Ww][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Hh][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Mm][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Yy][Qq][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Ii][Gg][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Vv][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Ii][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Bb][Ww][Bb][Hh][Aa][Cc][Ii][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Ii][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Ii][Gg][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Mm][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Yy][Qq][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Vv][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Bb][Ww][Bb][Hh][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Mm][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Yy][Qq][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Vv][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Bb][Ww][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Hh][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Gg][Aa]6[Aa][Cc][Gg][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Mm][Aa][Gg]8[Aa][Yy][Qq][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Ss][Aa][Jj][Ww][Bb][Kk][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Qq].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Oo][Gg][Aa][Oo][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Vv][Aa][Gg][Ee][Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Rr][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Zz][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa].*/ OR /.*6[Aa][Dd][Oo][Aa][Kk][Aa][Aa][Nn][Aa][Ee][Ww][Aa][Bb][Ww][Bb][Hh][Aa][Cc][Cc][Aa][Kk][Ww][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Qq][Aa][Jj][Ww][Aa][Pp][Aa].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.command_line:(*OgA6ACgAIgBMACIAKwAiAG8AYQBkACIAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACIATAAiACsAIgBvAGEAZAAiACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAiAEwAIgArACIAbwBhAGQAIgApA* OR *OgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AIgArACIAYQBkACIAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACIATABvACIAKwAiAGEAZAAiACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwAiACsAIgBhAGQAIgApA* OR *OgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AYQAiACsAIgBkACIAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACIATABvAGEAIgArACIAZAAiACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwBhACIAKwAiAGQAIgApA* OR *OgA6ACgAJwBMACcAKwAnAG8AYQBkACcAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACcATAAnACsAJwBvAGEAZAAnACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAnAEwAJwArACcAbwBhAGQAJwApA* OR *OgA6ACgAJwBMAG8AJwArACcAYQBkACcAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACcATABvACcAKwAnAGEAZAAnACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAnAEwAbwAnACsAJwBhAGQAJwApA* OR *OgA6ACgAJwBMAG8AYQAnACsAJwBkACcAKQ* OR *oAOgAoACcATABvAGEAJwArACcAZAAnACkA* OR *6ADoAKAAnAEwAbwBhACcAKwAnAGQAJwApA*)`
